[SIZE=5][COLOR="#00FFFF"][U]About Us[/U][/COLOR][/SIZE] [COLOR="#FFFFFF"]Our goal at Formality 718 is to provide our players with the latest and greatest Pking experience. We listen to you, the community. We don't fuel Formality 718's Success, our community does. Formality 718 dominates the competition, oh wait, what competition?[/COLOR]

[SIZE=5][COLOR="#00FFFF"][U]About Us[/U][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[COLOR="#FFFFFF"]Our goal at Formality 718 is to provide our players with the latest and greatest Pking experience.
We listen to you, the community.
We don’t fuel Formality 718’s Success, our community does.
Formality 718 dominates the competition, oh wait, what competition?[/COLOR]

-Working Crucible(Target Pking System)
-Active Staff

-Unique Content
